content: Phase 2.1: Fix ExamInterface - Update API calls, autosave, timer with localStorage, resume logic
Phase 2.2: Complete ExamCreator component for teachers - 60 MCQ questions with skill mapping
Phase 2.3: Complete Paper2Marking component - fetch submissions, mark essay + 10 short answers
Phase 2.4: Complete ParentDashboard - progress charts, skill trends, strengths/weaknesses
Phase 2.5: Complete AdminDashboard - user management (list, create, toggle active)
Phase 2.6: Verify TypesetterDashboard - PDF upload for 3 languages is working
Phase 2.7: Add axios interceptor for auth token injection
Phase 2.8: Test and fix i18n translations
Phase 2.9: Call design_agent for UI polish
Phase 2.10: Run testing_agent for comprehensive end-to-end testing
Phase 2.11: Fix all bugs found by testing agent
